'''Deep Within the Temple of the Falcon''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]]: Act I - [[The Outlander Who Caught the Wind]] quest ''[[Winds of the Past]]''. It takes place in the [[Temple of the Falcon]].

==Walkthrough==
# Enter the Domain
#* Amber will join as a trial character if she is not part of the team beforehand
# Interact with the console to open the door.
# Use Pyro to ignite the Dendro vines in front of you and clear the way to a common chest. Take the path to the left and clear the vines to proceed.
# The Door of Resurrection at the end of the path will automatically activate when you stand in front of it, you will respawn there, should you die.
# Defeat opponents. {{Enemy List|Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard*3}}
#* A Common Chest will unlock after defeating the first hilichurl.
#* Shoot the exploding barrels in the corner to break the stone walls, ignite the thorns, and reveal a common chest.
# Enter the next room and defeat opponents. {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Shooter;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard*3}}
#* A Common Chest will unlock after defeating opponents.
# Exit the room and activate the Pyro Monument.
# Ride the wind current and turn around to spot a common chest, on a ledge above the previous room.
# Use the wind current to reach the destination.
# Break the blue stone at the center of the room, which triggers a cutscene.
# A precious chest spawns after the cutscene.
